Secondary - Evaluate progression-free survival overall survival . - Determine time treatment failure . - Evaluate quality life ( EuroQOL EQ5D questionnaire ) . - Explore prognostic factor associate tolerability efficacy treatment . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord genotype ( UCT1A1*1/ UCT1A1*1 v UCT1A1*1/ UCT1A1*28 ) . Patients receive bevacizumab IV 30-90 minute , irinotecan hydrochloride IV 90 minute , leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour , fluorouracil IV 46 hour day 1 .
